content.html:
Regarding Together

Now that I've launched Indiepaper, I'd love to see Together add native support for sending articles to Indiepaper with the click of a button. This would require a few configuration settings, including the configuration of a bearer token and a target micropub destination.
content.value:
Regarding Together
Now that I've launched Indiepaper, I'd love to see Together add native support for sending articles to Indiepaper with the click of a button. This would require a few configuration settings, including the configuration of a bearer token and a target micropub destination.

summary: @alans thank you sir! Yes, you should :) If you don't have or want Aperture, you can also just create a separate site that supports Micropub and use that as your target.

content.html: @alans thank you sir! Yes, you should :) If you don't have or want Aperture, you can also just create a separate site that supports Micropub and use that as your target.
content.value: @alans thank you sir! Yes, you should :) If you don't have or want Aperture, you can also just create a separate site that supports Micropub and use that as your target.

summary: Awesome. I’d love to figure out a good way to do that token exchange automatically but it’s a good idea to prototype it out manually first!

summary: @cleverdevil I thought of that, too! (Making a new site with micropub and targeting it.) And, say, since I'm not using my hosted micro.blog blog ... idea: I wonder if I could re-purpose that as the micropup endpoint for indiepaper. That could be cool.
